ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess you at least have to get your twink to the place of the no drop item and keep him alive until your friends have killed the monster. No drop will
ygData.messageBody:
I guess you at least have to get your twink to the place of the no drop
item and keep him alive until your friends have killed the monster.
No drop will destroy the merchant part (read farming items to sell on
ebay) of the game though.

Drokk, da majik trollie lvl 38

Clanretri@... wrote:
>

>
> it's good that they making more armors for each class than just one for all.

> point of playing a game if everything is nodrop?! THINK
